title: Welcome to Hoard
current_lang: The current language of choice is "{{language}}"

device.permission_denied_message: In order to re-enable this feature you will need to allow access from you device settings first.

release_notes.title: Release Notes
release_notes.testnet_content: The Hoard beta app is a testnet beta app. If you use real cryptocurrency, you will lose it.
release_notes.testnet_description: This version of the app is a TESTNET version, meaning that you MUST NOT USE REAL BITCOIN OR ETHER WITH THE APP.
release_notes.testnet_faucet: To obtain test currencies, use a "Rinkeby Ether faucet" and a "Bitcoin Testnet faucet". On these sites, you can input the Bitcoin and Ethereum addresses found within this app in your wallet, and receive test Bitcoin and Ether to play with and help us by testing the app.
release_notes.testnet_bugs: To report bugs, leave us a bug report at github.com/hoardinvest/hoard, or use the support form in the app found under Get Help > Submit a Request.
release_notes.telegram: For more information, visit us on telegram at t.me/hoardinvest and thanks again for your support!
release_notes.intro_thanks: Thank you for participating in the Hoard public beta test!

open_source.thanks_projects: React, React Native, Ethers, React Navigation, Redux, React Redux, Redux Saga, Reselect, Victory Native, Lottie React Native, Prop Types, React Native Animatable, React Native Config, React Native Contacts, React Native Linear Gradient, React Native Search Filter, React Native Splash Screen, React Native Svg, React Native Swipeable, React Native Touch Id, React Native Vector Icons, and many other Open Source contributors.

forgot.error_message_email: There was a problem with your email address.
forgot.error_message_email_sent: An email has been sent to your address with instructions to reset.
forgot.instructions: Forgot your username or password? Retrieve your username or reset your password below.

submit_request.title: Submit A Request
submit_request.submit_success_title: Your ticket has been submitted successfully!
submit_request.submit_success_message: A confirmation email should be sent soon
submit_request.submit_error_title: An error occurred while submitting your ticket.
submit_request.submit_error_message: Please try again, or email us directly at support@hoardinvest.com

login.skip_sign_up: No thanks, I just want to use the wallet

send_request.instructions: Select a contact, manually enter an address, or scan a QR code.
send_request.no_wallets: You have not yet created any wallets
send_request.select_coin_request: Please select a coin to request with
send_request.select_wallet_send: Please select a wallet to send from
send_request.input_amount_to_send: Please input an amount to send
send_request.input_amount_to_request: Please input an amount to request
send_request.insufficient_balance: You cannot send more than you have in your wallet
send_request.missing_recipient: Please provide an address to send to
send_request.invalid_address: This is not a valid {{symbol}} address
send_request.other_no_recipient_send: Please enter a contact to send to
send_request.other_no_recipient_request: Please enter a contact to request from

modals.address_wallet_instructions: Enter wallet address in the field below.
modals.contacts_message: Hoard would like to access your contact list to send funds to your friends.
modals.contacts_subtitle: Type a username, email address, or phone number in the field below.
modals.contacts_not_synced: Your device contacts are not syncâ€™d. Click click the link below to sync.

settings.title: Settings
settings.your_keys_description: Your seed words are the only way to restore your wallet if your phone is lost stolen, broken or upgraded
settings.your_keys_description_2: We will show you a list of words to write down and keep safe.
settings.last_display_time: Your last seed word display was
settings.input_subtitle: Your PIN will be used to unlock and view your keys
settings.enable_feature_in_settings: Make sure you've enabled this option in your System Settings.
settings.change_notifications_in_settings: Notification preferences must be changed in your System Settings

signup.username_valid: Username may only include numbers, letters, and _
signup.username_length: Username must be between 3 and 18 characters

contact_transaction.heading: Pending
contact_transaction.request_subheading: This user has been notified that you have requested funds from them!
contact_transaction.send_subheading: This user does not use Hoard, but has been notified that you have attempted to send them some funds!

blockchain_transaction.failure_subheading: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again soon.

wallet.confirm_word_list_check: To make sure everything was written down correctly, please enter the following words from your paper key.
wallet.create_wallet_description: Okay, first up in the wallet creation process is creating your seed words. All you have to do is scribble, so let's get started.
wallet.seed_description: Next up, add an additional layer of security by setting up your PIN
wallet.your_words_description: Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.

testnet.warning_description: The Hoard beta app is a testnet beta app. If you use real cryptocurrency, you will lose it.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.subtitle: Never share your password with anyone.
